c74object.name: mb.simpplefm~
c74object.digest: A physically modeled string based on a karplus-strong string model.

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event. This instrument is not truely polyphonic, but rather will select active notes by chance.

method.name: sinPitch
method.digest: The offset pitch of the sine tone oscilator from the MIDI pitch from an incomming note.

method.name: sinAmp
method.digest: The volume of the sine tone oscilator.

method.name: adsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.
